title: Say hello to a traditional button remote for your Apple TV, now under $25
content:
Macworld

Apple TVs are an incredible device for watching the big game and streaming your other favorite shows. However, the included remote for Apple TVs isn’t necessarily intuitive, and you may be missing your button remote from years past.

Fortunately, you can make your Apple TV experience more user-friendly with the intuitive Function101 Button Remote. It’s on sale for under $25 through January 28.

With the Function101 button remote, it’s easy to make Apple TV adjustments, and you can navigate menus, raise or lower the volume, pause playback, mute the audio, and more. Since each function has its own dedicated button — with Siri or other voice controls needed— it’s far less confusing to use.

The Function101 is as old school as it gets, which makes it ideal for elderly parents, kids, or anyone more used to a traditional remote control. It uses infrared technology, featuring a maximum range of 12 meters (roughly 39 feet), and is compatible with all generations of Apple TV and Apple TV 4K products plus most television sets. 

Make your Apple TV experience more intuitive with this simple add-on.

Get the Function101 Button Remote for just $24.97 until January 28 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon needed!
